snp3.6:4.1: pakudho → pakuddho (s1-3, km), sañcayo → sañjayo (bj, s1-3, km, pts1), belaṭṭhaputto → bellaṭṭhiputto (bj) | veḷaṭṭhaputto (s1-3) | belaṭṭhiputto (pts1), nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto → nigaṇṭho nātaputto (bj, pts1)
snp3.6:7.2: yepi kho te → ye kho te (s1-3) | yaṃ kho te (mr)
snp3.6:8.2: samaṇo kho → samaṇo kho gotamo (s1-3, mr)
snp3.6:53.2: na upalimpati → toye na upalippati (bj) | toye na upalippati (pts1) | toyena na upalimpati (mr)
